content: वार्त्ता {@--1@} Staying, abiding. {@--2@} Tidings, news, intelligence; सागरिकायाः का वार्ता <ls>Ratn. 4.</ls> {@--3@} Livelihood, profession. {@--4@} Agriculture, the occupation of a Vaiśya; <ls>R. 16. 2</ls>; <ls>Ms. 10. 80</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 311.</ls> {@--5@} The eggplant. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. {@--7@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) The mere mention of facts without any rhetorical embellishment.
